title: Riverside Park
desc: A sprawling park along the Lagos River with walking trails, picnic spots, and a playground.

title: Heritage Museum
desc: Showcasing the rich cultural heritage of our region through rotating exhibits.

title: Sunset Beach
desc: Golden sands and gentle waves make this the perfect spot for families.

title: City Aquarium
desc: Home to over 120 species of aquatic life, plus interactive touch tanks.

title: Botanic Gardens
desc: A 10-acre oasis of exotic plants, fountains, and shaded benches.

desc: Fruit juice brewed on-site, with weekend tours and tastings.
